mapper.select: select i_no as no, i_title as title, i_body as body, i_writer as writer, i_writeDate as writeDate, i_hit as hit, i_good as good, fi_oriname as oriName, row_number() over(partition by fi_orino order by fi_no) as ff from imageinfo, information where upper(i_IsShow)='Y' and imageinfo.fi_orino=information.i_no(+) and i_good != 0
